rules.prepare:
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "cross-tools" ]; then EXTRA_OPTS="--build=$BOLT_BUILD_TYPE --with-sysroot=/ --with-ld=/tools/bin/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-ld --with-as=/tools/bin/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-as" elif [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "tools" ]; then EXTRA_OPTS="--build=$BOLT_BUILD_TYPE --with-sysroot=/tools --with-ld=/tools/bin/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-ld --with-as=/tools/bin/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-as --program-prefix=${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-" else # spoof the build type to trigger a cross build EXTRA_OPTS="--build=`bh_spoof_target_triplet $BOLT_BUILD_TYPE` --with-sysroot=/ --with-ld=/usr/bin/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-ld --with-as=/usr/bin/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-as" fi
cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR"
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "tools" ]; then # fix interp to be located in /tools/lib grep -rl '"[^"]*/lib\(32\|64\)\?/ld' gcc/config | while read filename; do sed -i 's@"[^"]*/lib\(32\|64\)\?/ld@"/tools/lib/ld@g' "$filename" done else # fix interp to be located in /usr/lib grep -rl '"[^"]*/lib\(32\|64\)\?/ld' gcc/config | while read filename; do sed -i 's@"[^"]*/lib\(32\|64\)\?/ld@"/usr/lib/ld@g' "$filename" done fi
# run autoconf for some of the patches to take effect for SUBDIR in . gcc libcc1 libdecnumber libffi libgcc libgnat_util libgo libgomp libstdc++-v3; do cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/$SUBDIR" && autoconf done
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR"
unset CFLAGS unset CPPFLAGS unset CXXFLAGS unset LDFLAGS
"$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/configure" \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --libexecdir="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib" \ --with-default-libstdcxx-abi=new \ --with-system-zlib \ --disable-multilib \ --disable-multiarch \ --disable-nls \ --disable-vtable-verify \ --disable-bootstrap \ --disable-libquadmath \ --disable-libmpx \ --disable-libmudflap \ --disable-libsanitizer \ --disable-libssp \ --enable-shared \ --enable-libstdcxx-time=yes \ --enable-linker-build-id \ --enable-threads=posix \ --enable-tls \ --enable-languages=c,c++ \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --target="$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE" \ `bh_gcc_config_for_machine $BOLT_TARGET_TYPE` \ $EXTRA_OPTS
rules.build:
# HACK: to disable compilation of DFP support in libgcc case "$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE" in powerpc*) export libgcc_cv_dfp=no ;; esac
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make -j"$BOLT_PARALLEL_JOBS"
rules.install:
GCC_VERSION="`cat $BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/gcc/BASE-VER`"
for ENTRY in all cpp-10 fixincludes g++-10 gcc-10 gcc-10-base libatomic1 libcc1-0 \ libgcc libgcc-dev libgomp1 libitm1 libstdc++6 libstdc++-10-dev \ gcc-10-plugin-dev; do install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$ENTRY" done
FULL_INSTALL="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/all"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make DESTDIR="$FULL_INSTALL" install
# we never use 'lib64', move everything to 'lib' if [ -d "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib64" ]; then mkdir -p "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib64/"* \ "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/" rmdir "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib64/" ln -sf lib "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib64" fi if [ -d "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/lib64" ]; then mkdir -p "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/lib" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/lib64/"* \ "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/lib/" rmdir "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/lib64/" ln -sf lib "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/lib64" fi
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "cross-tools" ]; then PATH_OFFSET="$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE" else PATH_OFFSET="" fi
find "$FULL_INSTALL" -name "*.la" -exec rm '{}' \; rm -fr "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/share/doc" rm -fr "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/share/info" rm -fr "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/share/man"
# these are all provided through the corresponding tools-* packages if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "cross-tools" ]; then rm -f "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/"lib*.so* fi
for PROG in cpp gcov gcov-tool; do mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/$PROG" \ "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-${PROG}" \ || true done
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "tools" ]; then rm -f "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-"* else for PROG in "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-"*; do BASENAME=`basename $PROG` SHORTNAME=`echo $BASENAME | sed "s/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-//g"`
ln -sf "$BASENAME" \ "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/$SHORTNAME" done fi
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "cross-tools" -a -d "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE" ]; then find "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE" -type l -a -name "*.so" | while read LINK; do LINK_TARGET="$(basename `readlink $LINK`)" ln -sf "/usr/lib/$LINK_TARGET" "$LINK" done fi
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- PKG_PATH="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/cpp-10" # -------------------------------------------------------------------------
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION"
mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/"*cpp \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION/cc1" \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION/liblto_plugin.so"* \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION"
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- PKG_PATH="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/fixincludes" # -------------------------------------------------------------------------
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION"
mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION/install-tools" \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION" install -m 0755 "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/fixincludes/fixinc.in" \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION/install-tools/fixinc.sh"
echo \ "#! /bin/sh
PATH=\"$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION/install-tools:\$PATH\" export TARGET_MACHINE=\"$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE\" exec fixinc.sh \"\$@\" " > "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/fixincludes"
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- PKG_PATH="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/g++-10" # -------------------------------------------------------------------------
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION"
mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/"*g++ \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/"*c++ \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION/cc1plus" \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION"
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- PKG_PATH="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/gcc-10" # -------------------------------------------------------------------------
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION/plugin"
mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/"* \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION/collect"* \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION/lto"* \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib/"*.spec \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION" || true mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION/plugin/libcc1plugin.so"* \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION/plugin"
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" != "cross-tools" ]; then ln -s ../../../libcc1.so.0 \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION/libcc1.so" fi
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- PKG_PATH="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/gcc-10-base" # -------------------------------------------------------------------------
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION"
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- PKG_PATH="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/libatomic1" # -------------------------------------------------------------------------
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib/"libatomic*.so.* \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib" || true
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- PKG_PATH="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/libcc1-0" # -------------------------------------------------------------------------
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/"libcc*.so.* \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib" || true
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- PKG_PATH="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/libgcc" # -------------------------------------------------------------------------
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib/"libgcc*.so.* \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib" || true
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- PKG_PATH="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/libgomp1" # -------------------------------------------------------------------------
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib/"libgomp*.so.* \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib" || true
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- PKG_PATH="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/libitm1" # -------------------------------------------------------------------------
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib/"libitm*.so.* \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib" || true
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- PKG_PATH="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/libstdc++-10-dev" # -------------------------------------------------------------------------
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/include" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/share/gcc/python"
mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/include/c++" \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/include" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib/libstdc++"*.a \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib/libstdc++"*.so \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib/libstdc++.so".*-gdb.py \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib/libsupc++"*.a \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib"
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" != "cross-tools" ]; then mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/share/gcc/python/libstdcxx" \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/share/gcc/python" fi
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- PKG_PATH="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/gcc-10-plugin-dev" # -------------------------------------------------------------------------
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION/plugin" \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/gcc/$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE/$GCC_VERSION" || true
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- PKG_PATH="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/libstdc++6" # -------------------------------------------------------------------------
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib/"libstdc++*.so.* \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib" || true
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------- PKG_PATH="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/libgcc-dev" # -------------------------------------------------------------------------
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib" \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" || true
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "cross-tools" ]; then install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET" mv "$FULL_INSTALL/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET/lib" \ "$PKG_PATH/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/$PATH_OFFSET" || true fi
